description: Boss Cock (Caleb Carter) pays a visit to Uncle Jizzy (Adam Faust) at the Dick Family farm. After harassing him, Boss Cock blackmails the man into having sex with him to save his land. Uncle Jizzy pulls Cock's ass cheeks apart and licks his pink Georgia peach. Boss Cock begs to be fucked, and Uncle Jizzy obliges, bending the County Supervisor over and ramming him against the side of a run down chicken coop. Boss Cock has other ideas, though, and after he shoots a thick load of cum all over the splintered wood, he calls his deputies to plant a moonshine still on the Dick family property, and then has Uncle Jizzy arrested.
series: Eon Films: The Dicks of Hazzard
title: Eon Films: The Dicks of Hazzard, Scene #03
